long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KrispCall for Chrome offers a quick and efficient way to make one-click phone calls directly from your browser.

Simply select a phone number, right-click, and choose the option to call with KrispCall. No lengthy copy-pasting â€“ just seamless connectivity at your fingertips.

Revolutionize the way you connect with clients, colleagues, and loved ones with these essential features:

ðŸ‘‰ Effortless Calling: Dial any phone number on the web with just a click, eliminating the need for manual input or copy-pasting.
ðŸ‘‰ CRM Integration: Make calls directly to the numbers available on CRM platforms, streamlining your workflow and enhancing productivity.
ðŸ‘‰ Multiple Number Management: Seamlessly toggle between multiple numbers, whether it's personal, professional, or different business lines, without any hassle.
ðŸ‘‰ Streamlined Call Operations: Take full control of your calls with a single click. Manage operations like hold, resume, transfer, and more, enhancing your efficiency and productivity.

Ready to experience the convenience of KrispCall? 
Try it today and discover a new level of efficiency in your calling experience.

TERMS and PRIVACY POLICY

By using this Chrome Extension, you agree to KrispCall's Terms of Services available at https://krispcall.com/legal/terms-and-conditions/, and Privacy Policy available at https://krispcall.com/legal/privacy-policy/. 


DATA & COOKIE USE DISCLOSURE: 

In addition to cookie and data use information mentioned in our Cookie Policy (https://krispcall.com/legal/cookie-policy/), this extension reads your KrispCall cookies to ensure that you logged in to your KrispCall account. Whenever you are logged in, we fetch your phone numbers to enable you to make a call from any Chrome window.


ABOUT THIS EXTENSION

KrispCall account is required to use this Chrome Extension. With this extension, you can view the KrispCall Dialer button beside valid phone numbers in CRM such as Pipedrive, Salesforce, and Hubspot. 

Requirement: To use this Chrome extension, you need to have a KrispCall account with an active subscription.
